statements: SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions;
SELECT condition_name, experiment_date FROM experimental_conditions;
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT condition_description FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_name = 'Control';
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_name = 'Control' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT condition_name, condition_description FROM experimental_conditions WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND experiment_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY experiment_id ASC;
SELECT experiment_id, condition_name, experiment_date FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY condition_name ASC, experiment_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT condition_name FROM experimental_conditions WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT AVG(experiment_id) AS average_id, COUNT(DISTINCT condition_name) AS unique_conditions FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_name IN ('A', 'B') GROUP BY experiment_date HAVING unique_conditions > 1 ORDER BY average_id DESC, unique_conditions ASC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions;
SELECT condition_id, experiment_name, researcher_name, experiment_date FROM experimental_conditions ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experimental_conditions WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT result_value, result_date FROM experimental_results WHERE result_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions WHERE experiment_name LIKE '%experiment%';
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_name, condition_id FROM experimental_conditions ORDER BY researcher_name DESC
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT condition_id, experiment_name FROM experimental_conditions WHERE researcher_name='Alice'
SELECT ec.condition_id, ec.experiment_name, er.result_value FROM experimental_conditions ec INNER JOIN experimental_results er ON ec.condition_id=er.condition_id
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions;
SELECT experiment_name, condition_details FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM experimental_results WHERE result_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT result_data FROM experimental_results ORDER BY result_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM experimental_researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%Jane%';
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions ORDER BY condition_id DESC;
SELECT condition_id, experiment_name FROM experimental_conditions WHERE experiment_name = 'Experiment A' ORDER BY condition_id ASC;
SELECT result_id, condition_id, result_data FROM experimental_results WHERE result_id IN (SELECT result_id FROM experimental_conditions WHERE experiment_name = 'Experiment B');
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(researcher_id) AS researcher_count FROM experimental_researchers GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING COUNT(researcher_id) > 1;
SELECT condition_id, experiment_name, JSONB_PATH_QUERY(condition_details, '$.parameter_1') AS parameter_1_value FROM experimental_conditions WHERE experiment_name = 'Experiment C';
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions
SELECT condition_id, experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experimental_conditions ORDER BY condition_id DESC
SELECT sample_id, sample_type FROM experimental_samples WHERE condition_id = 3
SELECT result_id, sample_id, result_date FROM experimental_results WHERE result_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM experimental_metadata WHERE condition_id = 1 ORDER BY metadata_key ASC
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM experimental_samples WHERE sample_type = 'control' AND condition_id = 1

SELECT experimental_results.result_data FROM experimental_results INNER JOIN experimental_samples ON experimental_results.sample_id = experimental_samples.sample_id WHERE experimental_samples.condition_id = 2
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM experimental_metadata WHERE condition_id = 3 ORDER BY metadata_key ASC

SELECT experimental_conditions.experiment_name, experimental_samples.sample_type, experimental_results.result_data FROM experimental_conditions JOIN experimental_samples ON experimental_conditions.condition_id = experimental_samples.condition_id JOIN experimental_results ON experimental_samples.sample_id = experimental_results.sample_id ORDER BY experimental_results.result_date DESC
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions;
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_id = 1;
SELECT result_id, result_date, result_value, result_unit FROM experimental_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM sample_details WHERE condition_id = 2;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researcher_info;
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions ORDER BY condition_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experimental_conditions WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT result_value, result_unit, result_date FROM experimental_results WHERE result_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researcher_info WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT sample_name, sample_type, sample_description FROM sample_details WHERE sample_type = 'Solid' ORDER BY sample_id ASC;
